name: Truck Driver:OffRoad Cargo Sim
description:
It's challenging driving on offroad tracks. Drive and play most popular and most challenging .In this game you have to play with multiple trucks and carry goods and other cargo items, and transport one place to another. The basic cause of this truck driving and racing game is to transport different type of cargo like hey, wooden logs, vegetables and crops and daily useable items from one area to another offroad area. You have played other truck games like, army truck, cargo truck and also play and enjoy the euro truck but for this game you must have 4x4 offroad truck driving experience for playing this challenging Off-road truck driving simulator truck game.
Features:
- Smooth and easy truck driving controls
- Realistic truck driving experience
- Easy controls
- Amazing FHD Graphics
- Fresh attractive music
- Amazing engine sounds
- Many cargo transfer missions
- Realistic 3D environment
- Different camera angles.
